name: Fish Generations
description:
Eat to grow to adulthood as a fish, then find a mate. Avoid dangers. Make it to the next generation, and pass better genetic traits.

This is my first LD entry and I finished in the last minute of the Jam. XD Real life cut into my time for a bit, so I had to scale it down and there are still some bugs, but I enjoyed it.

I used programmer graphics. XD

Controls: Up and Down Arrows
Theme: Growth and 2 Button Controls
